TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlCodeExporter extends System.Xml.Serialization.CodeExporter

summary.span: Generates types and attribute declarations from internal type mapping information for XML schema element declarations.

span.span: Generates types and attribute declarations from internal type mapping information for XML schema element declarations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La clase genera tipos de .NET Framework o declaraciones de atributos de las asignaciones internas a los tipos de .NET Framework.The class generates .NET Framework types or attribute declarations from internal mappings to .NET Framework types. Estas asignaciones internas generadas por la clase para los elementos definidos en un documento XSD o como elementos en un documento de lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (WSDL).These internal mappings are generated by the class for elements defined in an XSD document or as parts in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. no se utiliza directamente; se utiliza con la herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) o la herramienta de definición de esquemas XML (Xsd.exe). is not used directly; it is used with the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe). WSDL.exe usa los tipos o las declaraciones de atributo que se generan por y las asignaciones internas generadas por la clase para generar clases de proxy cliente o clases de servidor abstractas de un documento WSDL.Wsdl.exe uses the types or attribute declarations that are generated by and the internal mappings generated by the class to generate client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a WSDL document. Utiliza WSDL.exe y clase cuando se especifica un documento WSDL:Wsdl.exe uses and the class when a WSDL document specifies: - Uso literal, indicando que el contenido de los parámetros de mensaje SOAP y los valores devueltos (o documentos de solicitud y respuesta) se especifica literalmente con las definiciones de esquema XML.Literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions. - Implementaciones de servicios Web mediante las operaciones HTTP-GET y HTTP-POST no SOAP.Non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. - XSD.exe utiliza para generar clases a partir de documentos de definición de esquemas XML (XSD).Xsd.exe uses to generate classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks En lugar de crear una instancia de la clase directamente, utilice la herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) o la herramienta de definición de esquemas XML (Xsd.exe).Instead of creating an instance of the class directly, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe).

summary.span: Adds an declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

span.span: Adds an declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddMappingMetadata (System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection metadata, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping member, string ns);

.method public hidebysig instance void AddMappingMetadata(class System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection metadata, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping member, string ns) cil managed
Public Sub AddMappingMetadata (metadata As CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection, member As XmlMemberMapping, ns As String)
public: void AddMappingMetadata(System::CodeDom::CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection ^ metadata, System::Xml::Serialization::XmlMemberMapping ^ member, System::String ^ ns);

param.name: metadata
param.span: The collection of objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.

span.span: The collection of objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.

param.name: member
param.span: An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.

span.span: An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.

param.name: ns
param.span: The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.

span.span: The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.

summary.span: Adds an declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

span.span: Adds an declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método se usa por la herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) cuando un documento WSDL especifica un uso literal, indicando que el contenido de los parámetros de mensaje SOAP y los valores devueltos (o documentos de solicitud y respuesta) se especifican literalmente con las definiciones de esquema XML.This method is used by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.

.method public hidebysig instance void AddMappingMetadata(class System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection metadata, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping mapping, string ns) cil managed
Public Sub AddMappingMetadata (metadata As CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection, mapping As XmlTypeMapping, ns As String)

param.name: metadata
param.span: The collection of objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.

span.span: The collection of objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.

param.name: mapping
param.span: The internal .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.

span.span: The internal .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.

param.name: ns
param.span: The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.

span.span: The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.

summary.span: Adds an declaration to a method return value that corresponds to a element of a non-SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

span.span: Adds an declaration to a method return value that corresponds to a element of a non-SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) usa este método cuando un documento WSDL especifica implementaciones no SOAP de .NET Framework de servicios Web mediante las operaciones HTTP-GET y HTTP-POST.The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies the .NET Framework's non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.

span.span: The collection of objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.

span.span: Flag that helps determine whether to add an initial argument containing the XML element name for the attribute declaration being generated.

summary.span: Adds an declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

span.span: Adds an declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) usa este método cuando un documento WSDL especifica un uso literal, lo que indica que el contenido de los parámetros de mensajes SOAP y valores devueltos (o documentos de solicitud y respuesta) se especifican literalmente con las definiciones de esquema XML.The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.

param.name: xmlMembersMapping
param.span: The internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

span.span: The internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

summary.span: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for each of the parts that belong to a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

span.span: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for each of the parts that belong to a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) usa este método cuando un documento WSDL especifica un uso literal, lo que indica que el contenido de los parámetros de mensajes SOAP y valores devueltos (o documentos de solicitud y respuesta) se especifican literalmente con las definiciones de esquema XML.The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ExportTypeMapping (System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping xmlTypeMapping);
.method public hidebysig instance void ExportTypeMapping(class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping xmlTypeMapping) cil managed
public: void ExportTypeMapping(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTypeMapping ^ xmlTypeMapping);

param.name: xmlTypeMapping
param.span: The internal .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.

span.span: The internal .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.

summary.span: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for an XML schema element.

span.span: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for an XML schema element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) usa este método para generar encabezados de mensajes SOAP y tipos devueltos cuando un documento de lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (WSDL) especifica implementaciones no SOAP de servicios Web mediante las operaciones de HTTP-POST y HTTP-GET.The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method to generate SOAP message headers and return types when a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document specifies non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. La herramienta de definición de esquemas XML (Xsd.exe) usa este método para generar cada una de las declaraciones de elemento de esquema XML en un documento de definición de esquemas XML (XSD).The XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe) uses this method to generate each of the XML schema element declarations in an XML Schema Definition (XSD) document.
